name: Bunnylike
description:
Escape the haunted mansion

You are a tiny rabbit that somehow found it's way into a haunted mansion, and now it can't get out! Help it find the key to the locked exit and find it's way out!

Controls

Arrowkeys / WASD for movement

Space / Enter for attacking

Arrowkeys and enter for using menus

Use the numberkeys to use items(I forgot to add a graphic to display that, srry)

BUGS

You can quite often softlock in the beginning of the game. If you do, just reload the page and get back into the game!
